summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. A large truck is moving from the adjacent left lane into the self-vehicles lane, causing the self-vehicle to decelerate rapidly to avoid collision.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates rapidly due to the truck moving into its lane from the adjacent left lane. The vehicles speed decreases significantly over the 10 seconds, maintaining a safe distance from the truck ahead.
